entry.title: New release for Runtipi: v4.0.3
entry.content:
Release notes

This new release introduces two bug fixes.

Fixes - Assign a dedicated subnet for each new network to avoid conflict in IP addresses when the user runs more than 15 apps - Refactor repo cloning service to avoid and clean git zombie processes

How to update

From the root folder of your runtipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v4.0.3

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 3 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.

entry.title: New release for Runtipi: v4.1.0
entry.content:
Release notes

Features - Customize your runtipi dashboard by changing the base theme and the primary color - Add a button to download the self-signed certificate from the guest dashboard - Include app's user-config in app backups - Allow custom local subdomain for each app - Allow overrides by architecture in docker-compose.json - Links can now be displayed on guest dashboard

Improvements - After updating app settings, an indicator will be displayed if the app needs a restart

Fixes - Fix network overlapping IPs by looking at docker networks directly instead of using the database as source of truth - Fix repo pulling issue when origin cannot be detected automatically

How to update

From the root folder of your runtipi install

  • ./runtipi-cli update v4.1.0

You can also set an auto update cron for future updates

If you are coming from version 3 or lower please follow the migration guide

Please report any issue you encounter so we can fix it immediately.
